org.patneu.simpleflash

Class SettingsActivity

  • java.lang.Object
    • ActionBarActivity
      • org.patneu.simpleflash.SettingsActivity

  • public class SettingsActivity
extends ActionBarActivity
    An Activity providing the user access to the settings that are advanced or too unimportant to be shown by the SimpleFlash main class.

    Since:
    Version 1.0
    Author:

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      protected android.view.MenuItem exitItem
      A MenuItem used to finish the Activity (as well as all of its parent Activities).
      protected android.widget.CheckBox hideStatusbarCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the status bar should be hidden when the screen is locked.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox lockBackCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the back key should be locked when the screen is locked.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox lockExitCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the exitItem should be locked when the screen is locked.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox lockMenuCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the menu key should be locked when the screen is locked.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox lockVolumeCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the volume keys should be locked when the screen is locked.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationFinishCancelRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to finish an Activity sending a CameraOnNotification, when the Notification is cancelled.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationFinishClickRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to finish an Activity sending a CameraOnNotification, when the Notification is clicked.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationNothingCancelRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to do nothing, when a sent CameraOnNotification is cancelled.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationNothingClickRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to do nothing, when a sent CameraOnNotification is clicked.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationResumeCancelRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to resume an Activity sending a CameraOnNotification, when the Notification is cancelled.
      protected android.widget.RadioButton notificationResumeClickRadio
      A radio button used to set wether to resume an Activity sending a CameraOnNotification, when the Notification is clicked.
      protected SettingsActivity.PrefsManager pm
      An instance of the inner SettingsActivity.PrefsManager class.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox screenOnCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the screen should remain on when it is locked.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox showNotificationCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether a CameraOnNotification should be shown when the light is turned on.
      protected android.widget.CheckBox volumekeysUsedCheckbox
      A checkbox used to set wether the volume keys should be used to turn the light on and off.

    • Method Detail

      • onCreate

        protected void onCreate(android.os.Bundle savedInstanceState)
        Performs the start up operations of this activity.

        Initializes the activity's ui elements.
        Parameters:
        savedInstanceState - not actively used, only passed to the corresponding method of the super class
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        ActionBarActivity#onCreate(android.os.Bundle)

      • onResume

        protected void onResume()
        Performs the resume operations of this Activity.

        Loads the preferences and sets the lockMenuCheckbox GONE and disabled if the SDK version is lower than Eclair MR1 (because before this SDK version there is no separate action bar to contain the lockItem of the SimpleFlash Activity, that's why it is located in the normal options menu so that providing the possibility to lock the menu key would be a bad idea).
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        ActionBarActivity#onResume()

      • onCreateOptionsMenu

        public boolean onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu menu)
        Inflates the options menu for this Activity.

        Inflates the 'exit_actionbar_menu' resource.
        Parameters:
        menu - not actively used, only passed to the corresponding method of the super class and to {@link MenuInflater#inflate(int, android.view.Menu)
        Returns:
        the return value of the corresponding method of the super class
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        ActionBarActivity#onCreateOptionsMenu(android.view.Menu)

      • onButtonClicked

        public void onButtonClicked(android.view.View view)
        Handles clicks that are performed on the CheckBoxes and RadioButtons of this Activity.

        Changes the corresponding preferences when the CheckBoxes and RadioButtons are clicked.
        Parameters:
        view - the View that was clicked by the user
        Since:
        Version 1.0

      • onOptionsItemSelected

        public boolean onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem item)
        Handles the selection of items in the options menu.

        Finishes the Activity and sets the 'RESULT_FINISHED' result (to finish all parent Activities as well) if the exitItem was selected.
        Parameters:
        item - the MenuItem selected by the user
        Returns:
        true if the selected item was handled in any way, the return value of the corresponding method of the super class otherwise
        Since:
        Version 1.0
        See Also:
        ActionBarActivity#onOptionsItemSelected(android.view.MenuItem)
